description:
Classic Oyakodon recipe â€“ chicken and egg are simmered in a sweet and savory dashi sauce then served on top of bowl of steamed rice.

Ingredients:

2 boneless skinless chicken thighs

To serve:

small bunch Mitsuba (Japanese parsley) (or green onion/scallion)
